title: When a face-up Number 37: Hope Woven Dragon Spider Shark is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard, I activate the last effect of Number 38: Hope Harbinger Dragon Titanic Galaxy that increases the ATK of an Xyz Monster on the field. If The Transmigration Prophecy is chained, so that Number 37: Hope Woven Dragon Spider Shark is no longer in the Graveyard, how does the effect of Number 38: Hope Harbinger Dragon Titanic Galaxy resolve?
question: When a face-up Number 37: Hope Woven Dragon Spider Shark is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard, I activate the last effect of Number 38: Hope Harbinger Dragon Titanic Galaxy that increases the ATK of an Xyz Monster on the field. If The Transmigration Prophecy is chained, so that Number 37: Hope Woven Dragon Spider Shark is no longer in the Graveyard, how does the effect of Number 38: Hope Harbinger Dragon Titanic Galaxy resolve?
answer: In this case, even if Number 37: Hope Woven Dragon Spider Shark is no longer in your Graveyard when the effect of Number 38: Hope Harbinger Dragon Titanic Galaxy resolves, the targeted monster on the field still gains the ATK normally.
llm_answer: The effect of Number 38: Hope Harbinger Dragon Titanic Galaxy will still resolve normally because its effect does not require Number 37: Hope Woven Dragon Spider Shark to remain in the Graveyard for its activation or resolution.
